entry.title: Friday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to flurries this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
